title: Banned for 5 games, what the hell riot?
body: I have recently been able to successfully get through champion select and then not connecting for a short time during loading screen. The game gives me a disconnect/an abandon for some reason, even though I am still reconnecting after 5 minutes or so of countless attempts to reconnect. I am getting back into the game and playing as normal, but I am still being registered as abandoning. I have forumed my issue and the solution was to reinstall, so I have, and I am continuing to get the same issue. Furthermore, there were youtube videos regarding my issue in terms of removing files etc from the Riot folders. I have also tried these and still, nothing fixes my problem. I have never had this problem before up until a few days ago. And I am now 5 games in LP as the game registers me as abandoning, however I am actually still reconnecting. I am quite livid, I have to say.

replies.body: I just had the same problem. Net DC and i couldnt log in fist 5-10 mins finished the game and won then i get a message after game saying im in low priority que and it shows as a victory not a leave, anyone know way to contact riot support? OCE :Corpse frog
